object.creator: 杨智勇
object.name: lcIB_DZQZLCB
object.package: 100_新三板.持续督导阶段.01-定增签章流程
object.describe: 内核后签章流程(再融资、并购重组、其他适用)

column.name: BZSM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
在底稿系统中完成“申报阶段”底稿上传工作后，才能发起内核后签章流程'

column.name: LDSP
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/suggestion.sdo?LcbdID="+ID+"&Lcbd=lcIB_DZQZLCB"+"&Ywlx=110000";
"<iframe id='lc_zyldyj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"

constraint.SQL:
["KPJD IN (112,113,114)
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_DZFKHFLCB T,JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY WF
 WHERE XMMC = tIB_XMXX_XSB.ID 
 AND WF.ID = T.INSTID
 AND WF.STATE = 1)
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_ZDZCCZSBQZLCB T,JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY WF
 WHERE XMMC = tIB_XMXX_XSB.ID 
 AND WF.ID = T.INSTID
 AND WF.STATE = 1)
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_ZDZCCZFKHFLCB T,JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY WF
 WHERE XMMC = tIB_XMXX_XSB.ID 
 AND WF.ID = T.INSTID
 AND WF.STATE = 1)",[{"expression":"XMMC","length":0,"scale":0,"type":1}]]

column.name: SM
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var i=ABS_SQLVALUE('SELECT TSNR FROM ECIF.TIB_XMFXBSXX WHERE YXZT = 1'); ''+i+''

column.name: JGTS
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
客户单位是否持有“武器装备科研生产保密资格证书”、“武器装备科研生产许可证书”、“武器装备质量管理体系证书”、“装备承制单位资格证书”四证之一'

column.name: DZCS_BNDDJC
column.describe: 定增次数(本年度第几次)

column.name: SBRQTS
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '<font color="red">根据监管要求，请填写申报受理日期，并知会项目负责人和保荐代表人。</font>'

column.name: NHBZS
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select t1.NHZY_ZS from ECIF.lcIB_NHLCB_DZBGCZ t1 inner join jgcrm.os_wfentry t2 on t2.id=t1.instid where t2.state=4 and t1.XMMC=? and rownum = 1 order by t1.instid desc",[XMMC])

column.name: SFSJSM
column.describe: 是否涉及私募基金/私募管理人

column.name: SFQSBCFXCWGWXY
column.describe: 是否签署本次发行财务顾问协议

column.name: BASM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
请确保上传的附件与公文正文中列示的文件保持一致、该附件框中每一附件类型中仅上传一份最新版本附件至协同平台，用户可新增附件类型行'

column.name: DBXZ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=1'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'

column.name: FYYBCWJ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> O_THIS.getColumn("FYYBCWJ").setLabel("非用印备查文件
(不上传至OA)");

column.name: OASPXX
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_DZQZLCB' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/oAsuggestion.sdo?oaWorkId="+oaid+"&lcbd=lcIB_DZQZLCB&lcbdId="+ID;
"<iframe id='lc_oayj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_DZQZLCB' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
oaid<=0
